b'Before 12, the best Patriots QBs ever were Drew Bledsoe and Steve Grogan. 

The photo below of The Grog was the defining Pats photo of the pre-Brady era. It\xe2\x80\x99s true. 

Anyway \xe2\x80\x94 I just turned 50 and somehow had the same QB for 40% of my life. What an amazing ride. Thanks Tom Brady! https://t.co/Sd9GTVtw7c'

b'We lost a 2nd S.B. cuz we kicked off to Howard.

We almost moved to Hartford.

We had a coke scandal + a locker room sex harassment scandal.

Our best 2 coaches ditched us in \xe2\x80\x9878 and \xe2\x80\x9896.

Our 1st owner went bankrupt.

Our 1st stadium was an armpit.

Last 2 decades = incredible.'
b'PS: yeah I used \xe2\x80\x9cwe\xe2\x80\x9d like I\xe2\x80\x99m on the team... fuck off'

b'Thx to Tom Brady for 20 years, 6 titles, 9 Super Bowls, 30 playoff wins, 13 byes, 219 reg. season wins + 16 AFC East titles. 

Before he showed up, our greatest Patriot ever was a left guard. 

We didn\xe2\x80\x99t win a playoff game until I was 15.

We played 1 Super Bowl and lost 46-10. https://t.co/l7bWQiMkVO'
